articles.author: Monica Raymunt
articles.title: VW Says Weak Europe Car Sales Leave Two Factories Empty - Bloomberg
articles.description: Volkswagen AG defended plans to consider unprecedented factory closures in Germany, saying flagging car sales have left the company with about two plants too many.
articles.content:
Volkswagen AG defended plans to consider unprecedented factory closures in Germany, saying flagging car sales have left the company with about two plants too many.
